databaseConfig.sql: SELECT MS_SHR_JOUKEN.MS_SHR_JOUKEN_ID , MS_SHR_JOUKEN.SHIHARAI_JOUKEN_NAME , MS_SHR_JOUKEN.SEND_FLAG , MS_SHR_JOUKEN.VESSEL_ID , MS_SHR_JOUKEN.DATA_NO , MS_SHR_JOUKEN.USER_KEY , MS_SHR_JOUKEN.RENEW_DATE , MS_SHR_JOUKEN.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_SHR_JOUKEN.TS FROM MS_SHR_JOUKEN

SELECT MS_SHR_JOUKEN.MS_SHR_JOUKEN_ID , MS_SHR_JOUKEN.SHIHARAI_JOUKEN_NAME , MS_SHR_JOUKEN.SEND_FLAG , MS_SHR_JOUKEN.VESSEL_ID , MS_SHR_JOUKEN.DATA_NO , MS_SHR_JOUKEN.USER_KEY , MS_SHR_JOUKEN.RENEW_DATE , MS_SHR_JOUKEN.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_SHR_JOUKEN.TS FROM MS_SHR_JOUKEN WHERE MS_SHR_JOUKEN.MS_SHR_JOUKEN_ID = :MS_SHR_JOUKEN_ID

INSERT INTO MS_SHR_JOUKEN ( MS_SHR_JOUKEN_ID , SHIHARAI_JOUKEN_NAME , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES ( :MS_SHR_JOUKEN_ID , :SHIHARAI_JOUKEN_NAME , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_SHR_JOUKEN SET SHIHARAI_JOUKEN_NAME = :SHIHARAI_JOUKEN_NAME , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS WHERE MS_SHR_JOUKEN_ID = :MS_SHR_JOUKEN_ID
